package.name: pecl_imagick
package.summary: Provides a wrapper do the Image Magick Library. It's a native php-extension. See http://php.chregu.tv/imagick for installation and usage notes

release.notes: - imagick_sample(), imagick_resize(), imagick_crop(), imagick_shear(), imagick_rotate(), imagick_morph() are depraceted and replaced by the corresponding imagick_copy_* function, which return a new handle. The depracated functions will be removed in the next version. - Cosmetic changes to phpinfo() - bugfix for loading images without segfaults - Fixed some critical resource allocation errors
